text: Ate jisa dina inakara karana vale aga de sahamane li'ande janage. (Unham nu akhi'a javega ki) tusim apani'am cagi'am cizam sasara de jivana vica lai cuke ho ate unhannu bhoga cuke ho. Tam aja tuhanu apamana da dada dita javega. Isa karana ki tusim sasara vica vi'aratha hakara karade si ate isa karana vi ki tusim inakara karade si
